Text:
thanks mickedee77 and have a great weekend.
can you please do Monday's show even though it will be a repeat?
disneydreams, I do not live in the US, so I can only do episodes that are available online. If it is a repeat, then it most likely will not be available to me
Thanks! It's been downloading for a day now. Hopefully more people seed.
Good news disneydreams, Monday's repeated episode is available on ABC.com, so I can will be able to add it, just for you
